ygData.subject: Re: General grousing
ygData.msgSnippet: Please remember prices vary from server to server what costs next to nothing on one server maybe very expensive on another. Serp bracers stillseel for about
ygData.messageBody:
Please remember prices vary from server to server what costs next to nothing
on one server maybe very expensive on another. Serp bracers stillseel for
about 800pp on my server while a Stein of Moggik has dropped in value to
about 300pp. on a brandnew server you can pay up to 100pp for a RTS now they
are garbage. it is all realtive to your server and how much the buyer is
willing to pay.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th....
E-Marr



----- Original Message -----
From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 8:23 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] General grousing


> From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
>
> Here is some info for you,
>
> 1. A Serpentine Bracer for 800pp is one of the worst
> deals you can get. Even 2 for that much would be bad.
> The price has dropped recently so about 200-250 is a
> decent range. Many high levels give them away for
> free.
>
> 2. Monk equipment shouldn't matter that much. I will
> admit that I have recieved some nice items from guild
> members but what I would recomend you do is buy cured
> silk armor. Pretty decent price.
>
> 3. You don't need to loot everything but don't think
> its the end of the world if you go over your limit.
> Try to hunt near a place you can sell.
>
> 4. 250pp is quite a bit, you must not buy much. I
> only have about 140pp TOTAL at level 20. Of course I
> support another character and have recently bought
> some jewelry but still, don't consider yourself low on
> cash.
>
> Hammeron Stonspirit
> Monk of Quellious
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Thousands of Stores. Millions of Products. All in one place.
> Yahoo! Shopping: http://shopping.yahoo.com
>
> >
